**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 33 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28 [Solar Glass Golem](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2147) **Source** [Pathfinder #184: The Ghouls Hunger](/Sources.aspx?ID=147) pg. 40 **Perception** +17; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +20, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +22, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +18 **Str** +7 **Dex** +5 **Con** +7 **Int** -5 **Wis** +0 **Cha** -5 --- **AC** 31 **Fort** +20 **Ref** +20 **Will** +17 **HP** 195 **Immunities** bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), magic (see Golem Antimagic below), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Resistances** physical 10 (except [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=271) or bludgeoning) **Golem Antimagic** harmed by [sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147) (8d6, 2d6 from areas or persistent magic); healed by [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) (2d6 HP); slowed by [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27)
**Vulnerable to Shatter** A glass golem is affected by the [_shatter_](/Spells.aspx?ID=279) spell as though the golem were an unattended object.
**Spell Reflection** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11)) **Trigger** The glass golem is targeted by a spell; **Effect** The glass golem positions its magical, reflective surfaces to turn the spell back on the caster. It tries to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the spell by attempting an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check for its counteract check. If it successfully counteracts the spell, the effect is turned back on the caster. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** stained glass frame +24 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 2d6+13 slashing plus 1d6 bleed **Solar Flare** ([Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100)) The glass golem holds up its stained-glass frame and angles it downward, causing the image of the sun in the artwork to flash brightly, illuminating a 30-foot cone. This blast of light deals 8d6 fire damage to creatures in the area, plus 4d6 additional positive damage to [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creatures. Each creature in the area must attempt a DC 30 Reflex save. If this solar flare overlaps an area of magical [darkness](/Traits.aspx?ID=39), it attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the darkness effect (+22 counteract check).
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature takes half damage.
**Failure** The creature takes full damage and is [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) for 1 minute.
**Critical Failure** The creature takes full damage and is [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) permanently.
